titles.title: To designate the FAA Air Control Tower located at Memphis International Airport as the Freedom Tower.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 6/30/2010--Introduced. Designates the new Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) Air Control Tower at Memphis International Airport as the Freedom Tower.
